statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT behavior_description FROM user_behavior_data ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'click'
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(user_id) AS behavior_count FROM user_behavior_data GROUP BY behavior_type;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(behavior_timestamp) AS latest_behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM user_behavior;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.5;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM user_behavior GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM user_behavior GROUP BY behavior_type ORDER BY behavior_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 50;

SELECT u.user_id, r.recommendation_text, r.recommendation_score FROM user_behavior u JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.recommendation_score > 0.5 ORDER BY r.recommendation_score DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender, location FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE action='like' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, algorithm FROM recommendation_settings WHERE frequency='daily' AND algorithm LIKE '%collaborative%';
SELECT user_id, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM user_profiles GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_age DESC;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, algorithm, frequency FROM recommendation_settings WHERE threshold > 50 ORDER BY user_id;

SELECT user_profiles.username, user_interactions.timestamp, recommendation_settings.algorithm FROM user_profiles JOIN user_interactions ON user_profiles.user_id = user_interactions.user_id JOIN recommendation_settings ON user_profiles.user_id = recommendation_settings.user_id WHERE user_interactions.action = 'like' ORDER BY user_interactions.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorLogs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT behavior_type, timestamp FROM UserBehaviorLogs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, gender, location FROM UserProfiles WHERE age < 30;
SELECT product_id, SUM(interaction_type) AS total_interactions FROM ProductInteractions GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT user_id, recommended_product_id FROM RecommendationsHistory ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorLogs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS behavior_count FROM UserBehaviorLogs GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(*) > 5;

SELECT UserProfiles.user_id, UserProfiles.age, UserProfiles.gender, ProductInteractions.product_id FROM UserProfiles INNER JOIN ProductInteractions ON UserProfiles.user_id = ProductInteractions.user_id;

SELECT DISTINCT UserBehaviorLogs.user_id, UserProfiles.age, RecommendationsHistory.recommended_product_id FROM UserBehaviorLogs INNER JOIN UserProfiles ON UserBehaviorLogs.user_id = UserProfiles.user_id LEFT JOIN RecommendationsHistory ON UserBehaviorLogs.user_id = RecommendationsHistory.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM items WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT user_id, item_id, action_type, timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 40;
SELECT category, AVG(price) as average_price FROM items GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(price) > 100;
SELECT user_id, item_id, action_type, timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_item_id, score FROM recommendations WHERE score >= 4.0 ORDER BY score DESC, timestamp ASC;
